description: Ireland centre Garry Ringrose will learn his fate at a disciplinary hearing on Thursday after receiving a red card in the Six Nations defeat by Wales on Saturday.
title: Six Nations: Ireland centre Ringrose to learn fate at disciplinary hearing on Thursday
title_page: Six Nations: Ireland centre Ringrose to learn fate at disciplinary hearing on Thursday - BBC Sport
